name: Mashiroiro Symphony
nutshell:
In all-girl's school is preparing to consolidate with another nearby school, which will make them co-ed. Uryuu Shingo is chosen to be a male 'test student' at the girl's school before they officially merge in the following year. On Shingo's first day, he learns that many of the girls are not happy about the coming merger. Specifically, Sena Airi is staunchly opposed and refuses to welcome him to the school. Some of the other girls are friendly, but Airi has a lot of power over public opinion. The truth is, though, that Shingo has met Airi before. When she and Shingo's little sister got lost, he helped them find their way. Airi seemed to like him then, back when she didn't know he was going to be her new male classmate. Maybe he'll be able to win over Airi, as well as all his other interesting female classmates!
This is the official comic based on the game of the same name by Palette.

name: Sazae-san
nutshell: Slice of life manga about a woman named Sazae and her family.

name: Ishiguro Masakazu's Kyoufu Tanpen
nutshell:
Using the theme "Gag to Horror", the Gag Manga Artist, Ishiguro Masakazu starts his series of horror collection.
His first story, Shinchiku, speaks of an unfortunate tale of a woman moving into her new residential area.

name: The Wonderland of Ten Thousand
nutshell: The whole world can be seen in a single flower...The mortal world is nothing but a speck of dust to the immortals and demons.A single command from the immortals or demons will ripple through the mortal world.Wealth and prosperity are nothing but illusions.When humans die, their souls will return to the vast galaxy.

name: Shin Megami Tensei IV Dengeki Comic Anthology
nutshell: Anthology of shorts based on Shin Megami Tensei IV.

name: It's Not Fun Being the Empress of the Empire
nutshell: My name is Clara, and I am a renowned romance witch. The most outstanding Crown Prince of the Empire fell into an everlasting slumber, and was unable to awake. People made many speculations that it was I who did it out of love and hatred. However, I have never even touched his hand before! I merely went to visit the Imperial Palace one day, and sneaked in to catch a glimpse of the Crown Prince. But because of that glimpse, he actually fell in love with me at first sight and insisted on marrying me?! As a result, the Crown Prince led his troops into the forest. "Clara, stop playing around. I've come to bring you home."

name: Sore Wo, Kou
nutshell:
Ah, love... The little flowers, the song of the birds, the sun shines. Vacuum cleaner blows to the face. The crash of our heads against the walls. Strangling each other in that soft scarf we used to love to snuggle up in together. Sora Ono portrays couples who hate each other to the extreme, but always with a lot of humor!
For those of you who want your head to explode. This popular series with more than 300,000 RTs on Twitter has been turned into an illustrated book. Illustrations of the kind of things you would like to do if you had a boyfriend or girlfriend. Illustrator Sora Ohno completely destroys these situations in a wonderful way.

name: Futari no Himitsu.
nutshell:
Saijou Kiki is a model and child star, but with the release of her new commercial, her popularity skyrockets. At school, she harbours feelings for Takumi-kun… but she somehow ends up kissing Teppei, his friend?! And what's more, they've switched bodies due to some sort of old legend?!
Pt-Br:
Saijou Kiki é uma modelo e atriz infantil , que quando tem seu primeiro comecial anunciado fica muito popular. Na escola, ela é considerada um tipo de celebridade e a mesma, por ser meio timida, esconde sentimentos por seu colega Takumi-kun… Mas de alguma forma ela acaba, em um certo dia, beijando seu amigo Teppei! E ainda tem mais, ambos após o beijo têm suas almas trocadas… E agora o que eles farão para ter seus corpos de volta?

name: Ojousama wa Oyomesama
nutshell: Towako the ojousama (daughter of a high class family) will be turning 18 years old soon. When she was very young, she was told that on this 18th birthday she is to marry the young man who was born on the same day, the same time, and the same year as she was. However, during their first meeting, Yuuga was incredibly mean to her! What’s Towako to do when her husband-to-be is the shy and cool type of guy?

name: Kieli
nutshell: Kieli sees ghosts. It’s an odd ability for a 14-year-old girl, and it makes her a bit of an outcast at her boarding school. Her only friend, in fact, is the (semi-) departed spirit of a girl who used to inhabit her room. That is until the two encounter a young man who appears to share Kieli’s “gift.” It doesn’t take long to discover, though, Harvey is an altogether different sort of creature — one of the infamous Undying, the reanimated corpse of a dead soldier. Could it be that in this cursed fellow Kieli has finally found a kindred spirit? Throwing in her lot with this strange, soulless man and his possessed radio, she means to find out…

name: Noroi to Seishun - Fumino Aya Tanpenshuu
nutshell:
Collection of short stories by author Fumino Aya. Includes:

Chapter 1-2. Noroi to Seishun
Chapter 3. Bokura Jigoku no Touhikou
Chapter 4. Kamisama no Shinzou
Chapter 5. Himitsu no Hanazono Pink
Chapter 6. Chi no Ryouiki

name: Kenka Banchou Otome - Koi no Battle Royale
nutshell:
For as long as she's been aware, the heroine, without a single relative, lived under care of the state. Both of her parents' faces were unknown to her.
In front of this heroine, a young boy appeared.
The young boy's name was "Hikaru". It appeared that he was the heroine's twin brother, separated at birth. He had a proposal for the heroine.
"Could you go to school in my place?"
The heroine was shocked by this crazy suggestion.
Furthermore this was an all-boys school. The only high school in this prefecture for delinquents.

name: The Bell Rings in the Holy Night
nutshell: On Christmas Eve, a young man is about to make the decision that will change his life and that of his beloved, but fate intervenes putting them face to face with the voice of a lifetime's experience.

name: Tengu no Shiwaza
nutshell: The goal of naïve high school student, Midori, is to get rid of his virginity! However, he must unexpectedly spend his last summer vacation of high school at his father's family shrine, ruining his summer plans!! One day, whilst bored at the shrine, he decided to have sex with a tengu mask he found. Things were going great until the magic seal broke, and the real tengu appeared…!!

name: Shin Kamen Rider - Prologue
nutshell:
Shin Kazamatsuri was a motorcyclist. His father, Dr. Kazamatsuri is a scientist who hopes to find a way to cure the incurable, strengthening the human body through genetic alteration.
Shin becomes a volunteer for his father's experiences but unfortunately his partner, Dr. Onizuka has other plans in mind for his research while Shin needs to protect the people he loves from the mysterious organization known as The Foundation and CIA of Dr. Onizuka's obscure plans …

name: Yandere x Stalker
nutshell: It's a Yuri story of Yandere Shimazaki and stalker Ushida. This story show you a daily life between a yandere and stalker love.

name: Diabolik Lovers: More Blood - Sakamaki Arc Prequel
Hoshi no Kirby - Magolor Manga - Uso Tsuite Gomen (Doujinshi)
Koisuru Danshi ni Hoshi o Nagero!
nutshell:
俺たちで書こうぜ、BL小説！！
晴陽は投稿者Namiが書くBL小説の更新を
毎日心待ちにしていた。
「本は好きだけど自分には書けない」
そう思っていた晴陽。
しかし所属する文芸部の廃部危機を救うため、
小説を書くことになってしまった…。
筆が乗らず頭を抱えていた晴陽は、
学内文集でNamiそっくりの文体の感想文を見つけて…？

name: Maid ni Tensei Shitara, Ukkari Ryuu Ou-sama no Ibukuro Tsukanja Imashita
Return of the Legendary Spear Knight
nutshell:
Unrivaled Spear Knight.
The stereotype that knights must use swords is broken by the brightest star of a duke’s family. The hero that brought an end to the empire’s civil war. The name of that person is Joshua Sanders.
Despite his reputation of being called the empire’s unrivaled spear, he was bleeding dark red blood. Not just anyone but by the hand of his own emperor, Kaiser… “Kaiser! Don’t think it will end like this!!” Moments before death, incurred by magic circle, the spear that spent its years together with him, ‘Lugia’, started to emit an enormous amount of energy…
This familiar place, it can’t be… the stable that I used to live in when I was young?
My body became young?! Lugia, what the hell are you?
Joshua returned to his younger self. His ultimate revenge starts here!

name: Capture the Golem and Escape Poverty
nutshell:
Who knew that the game I designed for fun with my friend in middle school would later become a monster that would swallow up the entire world? Taejun, who has been living a tough life with his younger sister, loses all of what he saved due to a lease fraud. In despair, he curses, "To hell with this fucking world!!" while looking at Namsan… but the next day, the curse came true! Namsan suddenly turned into a large sinkhole where man hunting golems started endlessly spawning!! The world has turned into a living hell, but Taejun realizes that these golems may be a mob he created in the past? A strategy that only he knows of. Save the world, or save just yourself.



Official Japanese Translation


Official Thai Translation

name: Not-so-honest Kouhai
nutshell:
Meet Yasu's kouhai Moriyama: she's assertive, deadpan and can be very passive aggressive. What will she make Yasu do today? A hug? Go home together? Take a picture?
Note: This is the pre-serialization Twitter Webcomic entry.

name: Client
nutshell: A salaryman stressed out by his day job wakes up to a ghost threatening to kill him. In pure desperation, he shouts out that he'd rather be killed by a "cute cat-girl". And then…!?

name: Emblem Take 2
nutshell:
Shinjuku, 1979. A member of the Kaeda Yakuza gang, Akutsu Jouji, has lost in a brawl with a university cheering squad, and begs for forgiveness through bitter tears. Since then, nothing has gone well in Jouji's life, until 10 years later in 1989, his friend was ordered to kill him, and as he ran away he killed himself, ending his miserable life.
But when Jouji opened his eyes, he was in Shinjuku in 1979, at the fight with the university students that caused things to go wrong. Now with ten more years of memories and experience, Jouji repels the university students with spirit and wisdom. Now he swears to wear a gold emblem around town, and begins his life anew

name: The Prankster Who Went To A Femboy Salon
Touhou - ETERNAL MEEK (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Remilia and Sakuya talk about the red string of fate.

name: Psycho-Pass - May 25 (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Shion x Yayoi

name: Too Pretty
nutshell:
A very pretty transfer student tries to stay out
of trouble while everyone chases after him!
https://toomics.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/4630
